title: The General Loves to Collect Little Red Flowers - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Army Building   Arranged Marriage   Caring Protagonist   Cooking   Couple Growth   Cute Children   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Fated Lovers   Futuristic Setting   Ghosts   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Mpreg   Omegaverse   Power Couple   Pregnancy   Proactive Protagonist   Reincarnation   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration
author: Kun Cheng Xiong Mao   Trapped into a panda   困成熊猫
description:
The most domineering, arrogant and beautiful Omega in the Tarot Empire, Le Yao was arranged to marry General Xu Yao, who was known as the ruthless King of Hell.

However, the “Le Yao” now was a crossed-over soul from the earth!

After X days of marriage he gave Xu Yao a note…

It was written:

– Little Red Flower Agreement!-

Don’t swear a day, get 1 little red flower

Keep reading every night, get 2 little red flowers

Do good deeds, get 3 little red flowers

Get 300 little red flowers, you can pa pa pa!

Xu Yao: Hmph! Was Lao Zi like a dog in heat and want to do it with you?

But after a month…

Xu Yao: Hurry! I still need three more flowers, whose family is bankrupt this time? I’ll send a charity money, hurry!!!>
